ARABIC: أَوْ يَأْخُذَهُمْ فِى تَقَلُّبِهِمْ فَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or that He will not seize them on their travels, something they are powerless to prevent?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or that He will not seize them as they move about, and they will not be able to elude (His grasp);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or that He will not suddenly seize them while they are going about to and fro and they will be unable to frustrate His design,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Are they confident that God will not seize them while they are on a journey? They will not be able to escape from God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or that He may seize them while they move here and there, for they cannot escape?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or that He may punish them in the midst of their going to and fro (in their livelihood), so that there be no escape for them (from Allah's punishment)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or that He may not seize them in the course of their journeys, then shall they not escape;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or that He will not seize them in their going to and fro, and they will not be able to frustrate Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or that He will not seize them in their going to and fro so that there be no escape for them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or that He will not seize them suddenly in their daily activities and they will not be able to frustrate Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or, thathe will not take hold of them in their going to and fro! so that they cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Or that He will not seize them in the midst of their bustle, whereupon they will not be able to frustrate [Him]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or that He may not call them to account in the midst of their goings to and fro, without a chance of their frustrating Him?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or that He may catch them in the midst of their going to and fro (in their jobs), so that there be no escape for them (from Allah's Punishment)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, that He will not seize them in their going to and fro, and they will not be able to frustrate Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or that He will not seize them during their activities? And they will not be able to prevent it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:46] Or that He will not seize them in their going to and fro, during their travels for commerce, whereupon they will not be able to escape?, [whereupon] they will not be able to elude the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or that He will not seize them in their going to and fro) in their trade (that there be no escape for them) from Allah's chastisement?
